Record.ClassificationPath: Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Metabolic Diseases/Lipid Metabolism Disorders/Xanthomatosis
Record.Description: A condition marked by the development of widespread xanthomas, yellow tumor-like structures filled with lipid deposits. Xanthomas can be found in a variety of tissues including the SKIN; TENDONS; joints of KNEES and ELBOWS. Xanthomatosis is associated with disturbance of LIPID METABOLISM and formation of FOAM CELLS.
